 2022-12862022-12-02,  ,  ,  ,  IRC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of CONOR BOLAND SMITH of Montréal, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective March 23, 2023.
